title: Highest Internet Usage
description: In 2023, Bahrain achieved 100% internet usage among both male and female populations, marking a significant digital milestone.

title: Lowest Fertilizer Consumption
description: Bahrain's fertilizer consumption was only 0.06% of its production in 2022, indicating minimal reliance on fertilizers.

title: Minimal Freshwater Resources
description: In 2021, Bahrain had only 0.004 billion cubic meters of renewable internal freshwater resources, one of the lowest globally.

title: Lowest Freshwater Resources Per Capita
description: With just 2.66 cubic meters per person in 2021, Bahrain ranks among the countries with the least freshwater resources per capita.

title: Minimal Tax Revenue from Income and Profits
description: In 2020, Bahrain collected 6,637,382.12 LCU in taxes on income, profits, and capital gains, reflecting a low tax revenue base.

title: Negative Other Expenses
description: In 2015, Bahrain reported -9,260,000 LCU in other expenses, indicating a unique financial situation.

title: Highest Newborn Tetanus Protection
description: Bahrain achieved 100% protection against tetanus for newborns in 2023, showcasing its strong healthcare initiatives.

title: Significant Ores and Metals Imports
description: In 2023, ores and metals constituted 20.47% of Bahrain's merchandise imports, highlighting its reliance on these resources.

title: Low Intentional Homicide Rate
description: Bahrain's intentional homicide rate was 0.07 per 100,000 people in 2021, one of the lowest globally.
